headline: PTC Appoints Robert Dahdah as Executive Vice President, Chief Revenue Officer
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced that it has appointed Robert Dahdah as Executive Vice President, Chief Revenue Officer.

raw.headline: PTC Appoints Robert Dahdah as Executive Vice President, Chief Revenue Officer
raw.summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced that it has appointed Robert Dahdah as Executive Vice President, Chief Revenue Officer.

headline: Discovering December 2024's Undiscovered Gems with Potential
summary: As global markets navigate a landscape of mixed index performances and geopolitical developments, small-cap stocks have faced unique challenges with the Russell 2000 Index recently declining despite previous outperformance. In this environment, identifying potential "undiscovered gems" requires a keen eye for companies that can capitalize on growth opportunities within sectors showing resilience, such as consumer discretionary and information technology.
